MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the G76 postcode area  of Glasgow affecting properties in Clarkston, Carmunnock, East Kilbride and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of power issues in the area and only became aware of it at 8.15pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.15pm on the 12th October 2020.
